questions.answer: The language of Gerudo is used by women warriors of the same name in the video game Zelda. Their people live near a desert and are ruled by a man Ganon/Ganondorf. Any reference to these elements is a clue. The symbols are quite vertical, very rounded with long curves resembling commas/lines drawn with a brush. Zelda's universe has many other languages like Sheikah, Goron or Hylian.
